page.title: 02Arts/Crafts in Ballantrae.
page.content: Hand knitting is done by most women and is a useful pastime.An art class held in the Community Centre,during winter months,organised by Glasgow University,is ably supported,reaching exhibition standard.A little spinning is accomplished on a self-sufficient homestead.Floral art is another satisfying hobby in the area.SWRI maintains standards,through its tests and classes,in several types of needle work,leather work,upholstery,toy making knitting,crochet,housewifery arts such as baking,fruit preservation and cookery,attention being paid to nutrition.Wine making is also practised.
